ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag

Class Localisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Localisation

  • public class Localisation
extends java.lang.Object
    Localisation outlines the procedure for both the US angle correction and color position and angle correction by using filtered data from the sensors to update the odometer accordingly
    Author:
    Michael Vaquier, Oliver Clark

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a Localisation object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void colorLocalisation(boolean override)
      Performs the color localisation routine assuming the robot is positioned relatively close to an intersection of two lines
      double getClosestMultiple(double val)
      This method returns the closest multiple of tile length
      void resumeThread()
      This method wakes up all threads that were paused within this instance of Localisation instance
      void setFallingEdge(boolean fallingEdge)
      Sets the falling edge attribute
      void usLocalisation()
      Performs the ultrasonic localisation routine assuming the robot's rotating center is on the 45° line in one of the four corners of the Game board.

                    EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                    double tile,
                    int startingCorner)
        Creates a Localisation object.
        Parameters:
        odometer - The localisation association
        navigation - The Navigation association
        ultrasonicPoller - The UltrasonicPoller Association
        colorPoller - The CollerPoller association
        rightMotor - Reference to the right motor
        leftMotor - Reference to the left motor
        tile - Length of the side of a tile
        startingCorner - Corner in which the robot started

    • Method Detail

      • usLocalisation

        public void usLocalisation()
        Performs the ultrasonic localisation routine assuming the robot's rotating center is on the 45° line in one of the four corners of the Game board.

      • colorLocalisation

        public void colorLocalisation(boolean override)
        Performs the color localisation routine assuming the robot is positioned relatively close to an intersection of two lines
        Parameters:
        override - Localises no matter what if true.
